game.title: The Epic Quest
game.objective: Defeat the dragon and retrieve the magic artifact
game.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to save the kingdom. The dragon has stolen the ancient magic artifact and is causing chaos across the land. You must gather a team of brave warriors, explore treacherous dungeons, and defeat the mighty dragon to restore peace and balance.

task.objective: Gather the team of brave warriors
task.description: Recruit a powerful warrior, a skillful archer, and a wise mage to join your quest. Search for them in different locations, prove your worthiness, and bring them to the quest-giver.
task.location: The warrior can be found in the Dwarven Citadel. The archer is rumored to be in the Elven Forest. The mage resides in the Tower of Wisdom.

task.description: Enter the ancient dungeons beneath the dragon's lair. Overcome deadly traps, solve intricate puzzles, and defeat the monstrous creatures guarding the artifact.
task.location: The dungeons are hidden deep within the Dark Forest. Look for the old abandoned well as the entrance.

task.description: Prepare yourself for a fierce battle against the dragon. Use your acquired skills, teamwork, and the power of the ancient artifact to defeat the dragon and reclaim the treasure it stole.
task.location: The dragon's lair is located atop the highest peak of the Dragonspine Mountains. Be cautious, for the dragon won't be easily defeated.
